containing_words.word: 中國銀行業監督管理委員會

sentences.english: And here I was, ready to go negative on the entire banking sector.
sentences.chinese: 就在這種情況下，當時我準備看空整個銀行業。

sentences.english: The competition of non-banking financial institutions started a drive toward innovation of the tools of the banking industry.
sentences.chinese: 非銀行金融機構的競爭始於銀行業工具創新的驅動。

sentences.english: Shanghai i Securities News reported, to combat escaped and revoked debts has become an important task for the current banking industry.
sentences.chinese: 上證報消息，打擊逃廢債已成當前銀行業的重要任務。

sentences.english: He also spent some time in the Bank's UK structural economic analysis division.
sentences.chinese: 他還在英國銀行業結構經濟分析部工作過一段時間。

sentences.english: “ said Xiao Gang, the chairman of the bank of China that ranks the third in market value in Chinese banking sector, “But the possibility of the non-performing loans’ rapid increase is very slim.”
sentences.chinese: 但我認爲，銀行業不良貸款大幅增加的機率很小。

sentences.english: So instead of blaming government, they blame the banking industry.
sentences.chinese: 因此他們沒有指責政府，而是指責銀行業。

sentences.english: Incentive-compatible regulation is an inevitable trend in the progress of international banking regulation.
sentences.chinese: 激勵相容監管是國際銀行業監管演進必然趨勢。

sentences.english: Recently, people see much significant improvement on the cooperation environment of Chinese banking business.
sentences.chinese: 因此，合作博弈是中外資銀行業的必然選擇。

sentences.english: Banking in China is still in its infancy, with huge upside potential.
sentences.chinese: 中國的銀行業仍處在起步階段，發展潛力不可限量。

sentences.english: And within the banking sector, you have, you don't have that as strongly.
sentences.chinese: 在銀行業，那個沒有這麼強烈。

sentences.english: Investment banking had to be a separate firm.
sentences.chinese: 投資銀行業務必須由獨立公司承擔。

sentences.english: And that's how banking got started.
Banks, too, have been increasing the pace at which they are hoarding cash.
sentences.chinese: 銀行業一直在加快步伐囤積現金。

sentences.english: Studio flats meant for artists-in-residence get snapped up by bankers.
sentences.chinese: 藝術家們居住的單間公寓遭到銀行業者的搶購。

sentences.english: The price making of SPO is an technological innovation of investment banking.
sentences.chinese: 增發新股的定價是我國投資銀行業務在技術上的創新。

sentences.english: Well, the banks tend to be number one.

definition: same trade or business/person in the same trade or business
to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
